name: Incredible Myth from Bloody VR
description:
Incredible Myth from Bloody in VR German: Du wurdest auserwählt, um den alten magischen Kristall zu beschützen vor der Invasion der Gebirgsmonster, um zu überleben wurden dir 3 Waffen anvertraut aus verschiedenen Generationen  Die erste Waffe ist ein uraltes Schwert, die zweite Waffe ist ein Bogen der verdammten,  und die dritte und stärkste Waffe die Deagle der Zukunftsmenschen. Versuche dein Bestes um  Den Kristall vor der Vernichtung zu beschützen. Doch pass auf dich auf denn hin und wieder tauchen  Die Bossmonster auf wen du zu viele von seinen Untertanen tötest. You were chosen to protect the ancient magic crystal before the invasion of the mountain monsters, 
to survive you were entrusted with 3 weapons from different generations
The first weapon is an Ancient Sword, the second weapon is A Bow of the Damned, and the third and 
strongest weapon is the Deagle of the Future Man. Try your best to protect the crystal from destruction. 
But watch out because every once in a while the boss monsters appear when you kill too many of his sub-firs. Game: You spawn in front of the Crystal the monsters spawn in front of you, you have to extinguish as much as possible so that your Crystal is not getting destroyed. You can see your life in the menu by pressing the menu button on your controller. The more monsters you kill the more spawn every wave and every 5 levels a boss will Spawn who will cause a lot of damage to your Crystal if you do not kill him fast enough. Have fun and tell me what you think about the game. Enjoy Install Instructions

Unzip and run the .exe

Or Download with Itch.io app and get updates through the app.
